excerpt: 'The Masked Singer' panelists preview the 'Peanuts Night' Thanksgiving episode, including why Robin Thicke relates to Pig Pen and Rita Ora loves Lucy.
text: Good grief! â€œThe Masked Singerâ€ pays tribute to Charlie Brown, Snoopy and friends next week with â€œPeanuts Night.â€ The event will also air one day later than usual, Thursday, Nov. 28, as a Thanksgiving special. Variety has a first look at the Thanksgiving â€œPeanuts Nightâ€ edition of â€œThe Masked Singer,â€ which kicks off with panelists Rita Ora and Robin Thicke performing â€œYou Make My Dreams Come True.â€ Then, the Group C finals take place, with Sherlock Hound, Royal Knight and Strawberry Shortcake giving out â€œThanksgiving-themed cluesâ€ and singing songs â€œI Hope You Dance,â€ â€œHolidayâ€ and â€œHo Hey.â€ The episode, which airs 8 p.m. ET on Thursday, will end with a battle royale and double elimination. To celebrate â€œPeanuts Night,â€ the showâ€™s panelists also shared their favorite characters from the long-running comic strip (which marks its 75th anniversary in 2025). For Robin Thicke, he quips, â€œI kind of always related to Pig Pen, he just always needed a shower and I always wondered why he wouldnâ€™t take a shower!â€ Popular on Variety Jenny McCarthy Wahlberg says she connected most to the Halloween â€œItâ€™s the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brownâ€ special. â€œI love Charlie Brown. I love rooting for him, but I also love Lucy. If you go back to look at all of my school books, all I haveâ€”and Iâ€™m not jokingâ€”are pictures of Lucy. I drew Lucy, Lucy, Lucy everywhere. And then thereâ€™s a sweet connection to Donnieâ€™s [Wahlberg] fans. Every band, or artist, has a fan group. You have Swifties, Beyonceâ€™s BeyHiveâ€¦well, the Blockheads come from Charlie Brown. They come from Peanuts. When you go to the concerts, the fans are always bringing Peanuts merch. Donnie has a ton of Peanuts stuff around the house. The Blockheads actually come from Peanuts.â€ Rita Ora says she also gravitates to Lucy, especially â€œwith her psychiatric booth is my go-to because I always feel like I have these instincts personally so Iâ€™ve genuinely always related to her.â€ As for Ken Jeong, he feels a kinship with Charlie Brown: â€œHonestly my favorite thing ever in the Great Pumpkin Charlie Brown, my favorite line is, â€˜All I got was a rock.â€™ I just love that and it just keeps making me laugh to this day.â€ Hereâ€™s the first look: â€œPeanuts Nightâ€ on â€œThe Masked Singerâ€ (Michael Becker/Fox) â€œPeanuts Nightâ€ on â€œThe Masked Singerâ€ (Michael Becker/Fox) â€œPeanuts Nightâ€ on â€œThe Masked Singerâ€ (Michael Becker/Fox) â€œPeanuts Nightâ€ on â€œThe Masked Singerâ€ (Michael Becker/Fox) Drake Bell as Ice King, Bethany Hamilton as Macaron, Natalie Imbruglia as Bluebell, Laverne Cox as Chess Piece, Andy Richter as Dusty Bunny, Paula Cole as Ship, Marsai Martin as Woodpecker, Yvette Nicole Brown as Showbird and John Elway as Leaf Sheep are the celebrities who have been unmasked so far on â€œThe Masked Singerâ€ Season 12. Besides â€œPeanuts,â€Â Masked Singerâ€ Season 12 themed episodes include tributes to Mattelâ€™s Barbie as it hits its 65th anniversary, and the film â€œFootlooseâ€ as it marks its 40th anniversary. Miley Cyrus was also honored this week with an episode devoted to her music catalog, while also new was a â€œWho Are You Fest,â€ featuring music from â€œmemorable festival lineups,â€ as well as a â€œSports Nightâ€ and a â€œ60â€™s Night.â€ Tentpole themes that are back have included â€œSoundtrack of My Life.â€ â€œThe Masked Singerâ€ comes from Fox Alternative Entertainment. Rosie Seitchik, Craig Plestis and Cannon are executive producers, while Seitchik serves as showrunner. The series is based on the South Korean format created by Mun Hwa Broadcasting Corp.

Good grief! â€œThe Masked Singerâ€ pays tribute to Charlie Brown, Snoopy and friends next week with â€œPeanuts Night.â€ The event will also air one day later than usual, Thursday, Nov. 28, as a Thanksgiving special.

Variety has a first look at the Thanksgiving â€œPeanuts Nightâ€ edition of â€œThe Masked Singer,â€ which kicks off with panelists Rita Ora and Robin Thicke performing â€œYou Make My Dreams Come True.â€ Then, the Group C finals take place, with Sherlock Hound, Royal Knight and Strawberry Shortcake giving out â€œThanksgiving-themed cluesâ€ and singing songs â€œI Hope You Dance,â€ â€œHolidayâ€ and â€œHo Hey.â€ The episode, which airs 8 p.m. ET on Thursday, will end with a battle royale and double elimination.

To celebrate â€œPeanuts Night,â€ the showâ€™s panelists also shared their favorite characters from the long-running comic strip (which marks its 75th anniversary in 2025). For Robin Thicke, he quips, â€œI kind of always related to Pig Pen, he just always needed a shower and I always wondered why he wouldnâ€™t take a shower!â€

Popular on Variety

Jenny McCarthy Wahlberg says she connected most to the Halloween â€œItâ€™s the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brownâ€ special. â€œI love Charlie Brown. I love rooting for him, but I also love Lucy. If you go back to look at all of my school books, all I haveâ€”and Iâ€™m not jokingâ€”are pictures of Lucy. I drew Lucy, Lucy, Lucy everywhere. And then thereâ€™s a sweet connection to Donnieâ€™s [Wahlberg] fans. Every band, or artist, has a fan group. You have Swifties, Beyonceâ€™s BeyHiveâ€¦well, the Blockheads come from Charlie Brown. They come from Peanuts. When you go to the concerts, the fans are always bringing Peanuts merch. Donnie has a ton of Peanuts stuff around the house. The Blockheads actually come from Peanuts.â€

Rita Ora says she also gravitates to Lucy, especially â€œwith her psychiatric booth is my go-to because I always feel like I have these instincts personally so Iâ€™ve genuinely always related to her.â€

As for Ken Jeong, he feels a kinship with Charlie Brown: â€œHonestly my favorite thing ever in the Great Pumpkin Charlie Brown, my favorite line is, â€˜All I got was a rock.â€™ I just love that and it just keeps making me laugh to this day.â€

Drake Bell as Ice King, Bethany Hamilton as Macaron, Natalie Imbruglia as Bluebell, Laverne Cox as Chess Piece, Andy Richter as Dusty Bunny, Paula Cole as Ship, Marsai Martin as Woodpecker, Yvette Nicole Brown as Showbird and John Elway as Leaf Sheep are the celebrities who have been unmasked so far on â€œThe Masked Singerâ€ Season 12.

Besides â€œPeanuts,â€Â Masked Singerâ€ Season 12 themed episodes include tributes to Mattelâ€™s Barbie as it hits its 65th anniversary, and the film â€œFootlooseâ€ as it marks its 40th anniversary. Miley Cyrus was also honored this week with an episode devoted to her music catalog, while also new was a â€œWho Are You Fest,â€ featuring music from â€œmemorable festival lineups,â€ as well as a â€œSports Nightâ€ and a â€œ60â€™s Night.â€ Tentpole themes that are back have included â€œSoundtrack of My Life.â€

â€œThe Masked Singerâ€ comes from Fox Alternative Entertainment. Rosie Seitchik, Craig Plestis and Cannon are executive producers, while Seitchik serves as showrunner. The series is based on the South Korean format created by Mun Hwa Broadcasting Corp.
